Text: Hammer (song):  JAD Records ultimately released remastered versions of the early studio sessions of Bob Marley & Wailers; "Hammer" is included on "Fy-ah, Fy-ah" and a Sly and Robbie remix of the song is included on "Man To Man".
Triplets:<Bob Marley
